summary:
5 new tiers of crossbows:
Orcish, Elven, Ebony, Daedric and Dragonbone
descriptionHtml:
Crossbows Expanded - by Jonozilla

This mod adds a thing that was missing from the original Dawnguard add-on: an expanded series of crossbows so that once you\'ve used your regular and Dwarven crossbow enough you don\'t feel like you have to change to the next better bow or other weapon that you come across and you can be that vampire hunter that YOU\'VE always wanted to be, yes, you, person in the front with the glasses.

This mod adds 5 new craftable crossbows to the game,  each based on an existing ore or material from the vanilla game and built with already in game sources so that they don\'t feel out of place in the world.

Each Crossbow is craftable at the forge

Compatability:
Since this uses already in game assets it should work with all mods.
author: Jonozilla
